channel.title: Sports
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from Sports, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Urban Meyer on Ohio State being favorites, Alabama, Michigan HC search | FULL INTERVIEW | The Herd
item.description: Urban Meyer joins Colin Cowherd to discuss Ohio State being favorites to repeat as CFP Champions, Alabama and Miami proving they're contenders, and Mi...

item.title: Chiefs Reportedly Planning Move to Kansas in Proposed New Stadium Deal
item.description: Arrowhead Stadium might be in its final years of hosting Chiefs home games. The team is reportedly expected to move to Kansas in 2031.

item.title: Joey McGuire on Notre Dame: 'Be in a Conference, And You're in the Playoffs'
item.description: Texas Tech head coach Joey McGuire has an idea for how Notre Dame can avoid all of the College Football Playoff controversy going forward.

item.title: Sources: McNeil traded to A's amid Mets overhaul

item.title: Fan denies using slur during incident with Metcalf

item.title: Logan Lednicky caps dream with volleyball title at Texas A&M
item.description: The fourth-generation Aggie helped Texas A&M win its first volleyball title in a most improbable fashion.

item.title: Michigan closing in on No. 1 Arizona in men's poll
item.description: No. 2 Michigan is closing the gap on Arizona, which remains No. 1 on the AP Top 25 men's college basketball poll for the third straight week.
